abilities.name: Wash Shift
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Wash Rotom's type is Water until the end of your turn.

attacks.name: Drain Wash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.
